Package btp400.assignment1.frontend

Class AdminViewLibrarians

java.lang.Object
btp400.assignment1.frontend.AdminViewLibrarians
public class AdminViewLibrarians extends Object
This class creates a list of the currently registered librarians in the system. All librarian information except for password is displayed and a report is written in the registeredLibrariansReport.txt
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Nathaniel Ling

  • Method Details

    • getRootPane

      public javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane getRootPane()
      This method uses the setupView method and adds the view to the root.
      Returns:
      ScrollPane root with the view set up to format the list of librarians properly.

    • setupView

      private void setupView()
      This method modifies the VBox view to show the list of currently registered librarians. A temporary JSONArray is instantiated by using the viewLibrarians method from admin. A File pointer is created to point to the registeredLibrariansReport.txt file. When setupView is called, PrintWriter overwrites the data previously stored in the .txt file to print a fresh report. If the temporary JSONArray is empty, an error message is added to the view. Otherwise, this method iterates through the JSONArray and creates a String which displays the keys of the librarian JSONObject and writes the output to the .txt file. The String is used to create a Label which is added to the view. Any exceptions are handled using the setupLogger method.

    • setupLogger

      private Logger setupLogger()
      This method is the same as the setupLogger method in the Admin class
      Returns:
      Logger which appends the error message to the adminLogger.txt file
      See Also:
      • Admin
